title: Angelblood
description: Seven days…  Israel seems…different since he came out of his coma. His life has been saved but Alyx had to make a deal with the devil to do so. She has to hand Israel over to Lucifer unless she finds a way to defeat Samyara. But to do this Alyx will need Israel and Jordan, the two men fighting for her heart, to work together. Can they put aside their differences long enough to defeat Samyara?  Seven days until Israel is sentenced to Hell. Seven days to find Samyara. Seven days to raise an army.  This will be Alyx’s greatest battle yet.
author: Hanna Peach
